plays.text: Penalty to Marcel Hossa 2 minutes for Tripping Mike Rathje served by Marcel Hossa
Penalty to Ryan Hollweg 2 minutes for Boarding Dennis Seidenberg served by Ryan Hollweg
Goal scored by Jason Strudwick assisted by Michael Nylander AND Jaromir Jagr
Goal scored by Simon Gagne assisted by Peter Forsberg
Penalty to Jaromir Jagr 2 minutes for Hooking Michal Handzus served by Jaromir Jagr
Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 2 minutes for High Sticking Mike Knuble served by Darius Kasparaitis
Goal scored by Mike Knuble assisted by Peter Forsberg AND Eric Desjardins
Penalty to Branko Radivojevic 2 minutes for Hooking Martin Straka served by Branko Radivojevic
Goal scored by Mike Richards assisted by Eric Desjardins
Penalty to Jaromir Jagr 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified) served by Jaromir Jagr
Penalty to Tom Poti 2 minutes for Crosschecking Jon Sim served by Tom Poti
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Ryan Hollweg
Penalty to Michal Rozsival 2 minutes for Boarding Jeff Carter served by Michal Rozsival
Penalty to Peter Forsberg 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Michael Nylander
Penalty to Keith Primeau 2 minutes for Tripping Blair Betts served by Keith Primeau
Goal scored by Jamie Lundmark unassisted
Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 2 minutes for Interference Brian Savage served by Darius Kasparaitis
Penalty to Jon Sim 2 minutes for High Sticking Martin Rucinsky served by Jon Sim
Goal scored by Jaromir Jagr assisted by Martin Straka AND Martin Rucinsky
Penalty to Peter Forsberg 2 minutes for Tripping Martin Rucinsky served by Peter Forsberg
Goal scored by Jaromir Jagr assisted by Tom Poti AND Martin Straka
Goal scored by Marcel Hossa assisted by Steve Rucchin AND Ryan Hollweg
Penalty to Dominic Moore 2 minutes for Tripping Keith Primeau served by Dominic Moore
